mapper.select: SELECT t.dict_id dictId, t.dict_name dictName, t.create_user_id careateUserId, t.create_time createTime, t.modify_user_id modifyUserId, t.modify_time modifyTime, t.sort sort, t.is_valid isValid, t.parent_id parentId FROM `t_gq_fss_dict` t where t.dict_id=#{dictId}

SELECT t.dict_id dictId, t.dict_name dictName, t.create_user_id careateUserId, t.create_time createTime, t.modify_user_id modifyUserId, t.modify_time modifyTime, t.sort sort, t.is_valid isValid, t.parent_id parentId FROM `t_gq_fss_dict` t where t.dict_id NOT IN
#{dictId}

SELECT t.dict_id dictId, t.dict_name dictName, t.create_user_id careateUserId, t.create_time createTime, t.modify_user_id modifyUserId, t.modify_time modifyTime, t.sort sort, t.is_valid isValid, t.parent_id parentId FROM `t_gq_fss_dict` t where t.dict_id IN
#{dictId}
